content: **video tutorial coming soon** this hat pattern is perfectly unisex it can be made more masculine through color or more feminine through the addition of buttons appliques and color choices the pattern is written with sizing for adults/older teens in mind check your gauge after completing round 3 pattern written in us crochet terms feel free to contact me with any questions here on ravelry facebook or through email at tangledinyarncrochet@gmail com ☺ **materials ** m hook k hook 1 skein approx 80 yds of super bulky yarn 1 partial skein optional approx 20 yds of super bulky yarn yarn needle feel free to sell the finished hat please give credit by linking to my blog and my etsy shop when doing so www tangledinyarncrochet weebly com and www tangledinyarncrochet etsy com please do not reproduce or sell the pattern or photos in any way
